name: Lights Out (itch) (Gamemaker Casts)
description:
Overview

The class lights out game is a puzzle game where you need to turn of all of the lights in order to win. With a single click you can turn off multiple lights at once, so you need to take time and think about your moves.

Turning on/off lights

With a single click you will turn on/off the light you have clicked on, as well as the lights above, below, to the right and finally to the left.
